text.autoconfig.fasterminecarts.title: Faster Minecarts
text.autoconfig.fasterminecarts.option.a: Enable automatic slowdown to prevent derailing at corners and hills.
You can turn off automatic slowdown on hills from here.
text.autoconfig.fasterminecarts.option.s: The mod needs to check for corners and ascending rails in advance.
This setting controls the approximate distance for the check.
Higher values indicate earlier slowdown before corners and hills.
Note higher speeds probably require higher check distances, but this may impact server performance.
text.autoconfig.fasterminecarts.option.m: Enable manual slowdown on soul sand blocks, slime blocks, and honey blocks.
text.autoconfig.fasterminecarts.option.s: Enable automatic slowdown for hopper and chest minecarts on hopper entities.
text.autoconfig.fasterminecarts.option.m: Change the maximum speed set by acceleration rails.
Vanilla value is 8, default value is 24 (in meters per second).
text.autoconfig.fasterminecarts.option.c: Change the maximum speed set by lapis lazuli rails.
Vanilla value is 8, default value is 15 (in meters per second).
Change the maximum speed set by copper rails.
Vanilla value is 8, default value is 20 (in meters per second).
